intro: Neobartsia patens, commonly known as the spreading bartsia, is a flowering plant native to the southeastern United States. Neobartsia patens thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in open woodlands or along stream banks. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for ecological studies and conservation efforts.
